thread.title: LSU mascot hunting Gators before matchup
thread.title_full: LSU mascot hunting Gators before matchup - UPI.com

author: upi.com
title: LSU mascot hunting Gators before matchup
text:
Mike gets a little help from Tommy Chauvin in his swampy adventure - Mike's Gator Huntin' video drops Thursday!
Posted by Mike The Tiger on  Wednesday, October 14, 2015 BATON ROUGE, La., Oct. 17 (UPI) -- Mike the Tiger has quite the appetite for alligator, according to his Facebook accounts.
The LSU mascot posted a video Friday, showing the live tiger eating "Gator tartare."
The Mike The Tiger official Facebook account showcased a video Thursday of the dressed up mascot "prowling the bayou for some Tiger Bait." Mike The Tiger enjoyed the boating trip with Tommy Chauvin, of "Swamp People."
LSU (5-0) enjoys a No. 5 ranking in the Coaches Poll, while Florida (6-0) comes in at No. 11.
Gator tartare. How do you like your gator? #lsu #lsufootball 
A photo posted by Mike VI, LSU's Live Mascot (@miketigervi) on Oct 16, 2015 at 7:31am PDT 
The Gators and Tigers kick off at 7 p.m. Saturday in Baton Rouge.
Mike the Tiger - Born on the Bayou Mike The Tiger prowling the bayou for some Tiger Bait... #BeatUF #LSU #GeauxTigers**No gators were harmed in the making of this video.**
Posted by Mike The Tiger on Thursday, October 15, 2015   Florida appeals Will Grier suspension Steve Spurrier announces stunning decision Florida Gators QB Grier suspended by NCAA for for failing drug test
